# markmap-render

![NPM](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/markmap-render.svg)
![License](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/markmap-render.svg)
![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dt/markmap-render.svg)

Render a markmap as an interactive HTML.

## Install

```sh
$ npm install markmap-render
```
